DOC.brief_summary: The aim study determine whether high high density lipoprotein-cholesterol ( HDL-C ) level low Cholesteryl Ester Transfer Protein ( CETP ) activity atherogenic subject receive health checkup . We investigate association CETP activity severity atherosclerosis assess intima-media thickness ( IMT ) compare atherogenic change subject high HDL-C level , low HDL-C level , high CETP activity low CETP activity examine morbidity rate atherogenic disease , rate ischemic electrocardiography ( ECG ) change , Calc Score artery chest X-ray , Ankle Brachial Index/Pulse Wave Velocity various serum atherogenic marker . And also examine correlation normal lipid profile concentration , activity function surface lipoprotein subject variety lipoprotein level , include patient hyper-LDL-cholesterolemia , hyper-HDL-cholesterolemia low CETP activity , patient high level remnant cholesterol hyperlipoproteinemia apolipoprotein ( Apo ) B-48 .
DOC.brief_title: Relationship Between CETP Deficiency Atherosclerosis Patients With Hyperalphalipoproteinemia
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Subjects age 40 undergo annual health check Omagari area include Daisen city Yokote city provide write informed consent . Exclusion criterion : 1 . Those provide write informed consent . 2 . Those able take test . 3 . Those regarded adequate subject study physician .
DOC.keyword: CETP , HDL , LDL , apoB-100 , apoB-48 , remnant
